entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
